wikipedia_page.main: Graham Horne (born 10 June 1971) is a Scottish former professional snooker player.

response: *Other debutants this year were Bradley Jones (England); Graham Horne; David McLellan and future World Champion and twice runner-up Graeme Dott (all Scotland); Lee Walker and Dominic Dale (Wales). All these players lost in the first round except Dale and Walker, who reached the last-16 and quarter finals respectively. This meant that all three Welsh debutants won their first round matches.

link_mentions.page: List of players to appear in the World Snooker Championship
